00016 #include "DummySync.h"
00017 #include "TTEScheduler.h"
00018 #include "SchedulerMessageEvents_m.h"
00019 #include "SyncNotification_m.h"
00020 
00021 using namespace TTEthernetModel;
00022 
00023 Define_Module( DummySync);
00024 
00025 int DummySync::numInitStages() const
00026 {
00027     return 3;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void DummySync::initialize(int stage)
00031 {
00032     if(stage==1)
00033     {
00034         TTEScheduler *tteScheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00035         SchedulerActionTimeEvent *event = new SchedulerActionTimeEvent("Sync Task Event", ACTION_TIME_EVENT);
00036         event->setAction_time(par("action_time").longValue());
00037         event->setDestinationGate(gate("schedulerIn"));
00038         tteScheduler->registerEvent(event);
00039     }
00040     if(stage==2)
00041     {
00042         notify(SYNC);
00043         getDisplayString().setTagArg("i", 1, "green");
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00047 void DummySync::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00048 {
00049     TTEScheduler *tteScheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00050     if(msg->arrivedOn("schedulerIn")){
00051         if(tteScheduler->getCycles()>1){
00052             unsigned int cycleTicks = tteScheduler->par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00053             double tick = tteScheduler->par("tick").doubleValue();
00054 
00055             long modticks = ((int)(simTime().dbl()/tick)-par("action_time").longValue())%cycleTicks;
00056             if(modticks>(cycleTicks/2))
00057                 modticks=modticks-cycleTicks;
00058             modticks+=uniform(-par("precission").doubleValue()/2, par("precission").doubleValue()/2)/tick;
00059 
00060             tteScheduler->clockCorrection(-modticks);
00061         }
00062 
00063         SchedulerActionTimeEvent *event = (SchedulerActionTimeEvent *)msg;
00064         tteScheduler->registerEvent(event);
00065     }
00066 }
